body.head: 2023: nothing new

figure.head: European end of my time line

body.p: What's left to say about the year 2023? Almost everything that happened this year seems to have been a replay of something that happened last year, with some minor variation in the detail. The year fits around me like a worn-out dressing gown, corners and creases familiar as old friends and acquaintance (a crew which continues to diminish alas). Not much new to report. A diary full of trivia like this:

list.label: January
list.item: 21 Waitrose delivery; 25 BRI Dermatology appointment.
list.label: February
list.item: 2: Nordea hygientist; 11: Belinda visits; 15: Orthodentist Imogen; 16-18 visit to Kayes, staying at 26 Buxton Rd; 28 Pam supper
list.label: March

list.item: 15: Hotwells panto;
23: first spring time escape to France. STP-Paris dep 1531 arr 1850, overnight Paris Hotel Orphee;

list.label: April

list.item: 9 (easter) evelyne lunch
16 Marche de printemps in Bussiere
19 Gueret-StSulpiceLauriere-Chateauroux-Paris (d1120 arr 1820) overnight Hotel Liege Strasbourg
20th: Paris-London-Bristol

list.label: May
June

list.item: 2: slow train from Lyon to Gueret via St Germain des Fossees, Montlucon;
4 : L arrives at Limoges airport infeasibly late ;
25/26 just me to Paris and back via La S for CS Labex ; overnight at Mercure Gare de Lyon

list.label: July

list.item: 3: flight LIG-BRI dep 2215;
8: Wolfson Nick Allen mem;
10: outing to Dursley for L's birthday with P+P followed on 11th by lunch @ sonny stores;
13 to Maryland (till 16th) for Daphne's ballet show
22nd : barby at cpr

list.label: August

list.item: 4-6 to Nottingham for Harvey's birthday;
7-10 Kayes visit us for Daphne's birthday;
13th Fly to France (BRS-LIG) John drives us home in his van
26-7th : Fete in Bussiere

list.label: September

list.item: 13 Gueret-Limoges-Paris-STP (d 1130 arr 2130). overnight at Premier Inn Stratford;
14th take Alex out for birthday lunch

list.label: October

list.item: 11th STP-Paris; overnight at Hotel Terminus Gare de Lyon;
0940 train to La Souterraine on 12th. (trip delayed at enormous expense sigh);
In La Vergne till 18th (train Gueret-Limoges-Poitiers-Tours); Hotrel LAdresse; Formation TEI-1 till 21.
Tiours-Vierzon dep 1936 arr 2101 and stay with ? again. Expensive but nice
22 : Vierzon-La Souterraine (arriving 1324 when all shops are shut).
24th: Serge Joyeux visits to discuss new staircase
27th La Souterraine-Paris-London-Bristol as before, dep 1425, arr 2130 stp.

list.label: November

list.item: 10th to Nottingham for Belinda's half-centenerary. We stayed at Airbnbs.
23rd 1631 London-Paris-Tours (dep 1631 arr 2215)
24th CESR anniversary colloqium; train to Vierzon (dep 1936 arr 2101); Arche hotel quite nice when I;d found it
25th Vierzon-La Souterraine dep 1045 arr 1205; pick up by Lucy; a wintry weekend
Tues 28: Lucymobile again, La Souterraine-Paris-St Pancras-Bristol (dep 1425 arr c. 2230)

list.label: December

list.item: 9@ Birthday dinner at Kibou
10: Gurt Lush concert
11: Dine with P&P
23: Wedding anniv lunch at the Ivy
25: Xmas lunch with everyone except Belinda at Sarah's new gaff
